profile.zh:
一位有 上進心 的跨領域開發者，僅用三年半完成雙學士學位，展現非凡學習能力。

曾在四個不同學科的實驗室進行研究，培養了強大的 跨學科整合能力。

通過帶領 跨領域團隊 贏得四項國家級創新獎項，展示出卓越的領導才能和解決實際問題的技術能力。

在創業公司與大型企業的工作經驗中，充分發揮 團隊合作 精神和 創新思維，積累了豐富的實戰經驗。
profile.en:
A highly self-motivated and adaptive cross-domain developer who completed dual bachelor’s degrees within just three and a half years.

Demonstrated exceptional learning agility through research assistant roles across 4 diverse laboratories, showing strong interdisciplinary integration capabilities.

Led cross functional teams to win four national innovation awards, while excelling at implementing technical solutions for real-world challenges.

Gained valuable experience in both startups and large enterprises, demonstrating outstanding teamwork and innovative thinking.

degree.zh: 資訊工程學系 工程學士 GPA 4.2
degree.en: Bachelor of Engineer in Computer Science and Information Engineering GPA 4.2

degree.zh: 財務金融學系 管理學士

zh: 通過實施向量化計算，構建並部署了一個電網統計系統，為台灣電力公司每小時處理超過 60,000 個數據點。
通過開發結合 LSTM 的集成學習模型，將電網負載預測誤差降低了 85%，在生產環境中達到 0.25 的MAPE。
en: Architected and deployed a power grid stats system by implementing vectorized computing, processing 60K+ data points hourly for Taiwan Power Company.
Reduced power grid load prediction error by 85% by developing an ensemble model combining LSTM and Prophet, achieving MAPE of 0.25 in production environment.

zh: 致力開發更新、更智能的作業系統用於革新人們使用的穿戴裝置。
en: Driven to revolutionize the way people interact with newer and smarter devices with Android and WearOS platforms.

title.zh: 機器學習/深度學習 工程師 實習生

zh: 開發了基於 LLM 的預提交代碼分析系統，並將其集成到 SmartIDE 中。
通過實現本地 LLM 和自定義函數呼叫，將 token 成本降低了 83%。
通過平行化執行程式工作流，加快了 75% 的程式碼審查過程。
通過與 SWRD 團隊合作優化審查規則，實現了 0.62 的 recall rate。
en: Developed pre-commit code analysis system by integrating LLM capabilities into SmartIDE.
Reduced token costs by 83% through implementing local LLM with custom function calling.
Accelerated code review process by 75% by optimizing parallel workflow execution.
Achieved 0.62 recall rate through collaboration with SWRD team on review rule optimization.

title.zh: 機器學習/後端 工程師 實習生

zh: 通過在 AWS Spark（20個 t3.2xlarge 節點）上實施分佈式計算，設計了一個高擴展性的 AutoML 平台，服務於 50 多名研究人員，在分類、時間序列和回歸任務中將模型訓練時間減少了 80%。
通過開發實時機器學習參數優化系統，提高了發酵效率 35%，能夠在 5 分鐘處理窗口內平行評估 20 個模型。
en: Architected a high-scale AutoML platform serving 50+ researchers by implementing distributed computing on AWS Spark (20 t3.2xlarge nodes), reducing model training time by 80% across classification, time-series and regression tasks.
Boosted fermentation efficiency by 35% through developing a real-time ML parameter optimization system, enabling parallel evaluation of 20 models within 5-minute processing windows.

company.zh: 資訊工程實驗室 / 財金實驗室 國立中央大學
company.en: CSIE Lab / Finance Lab in National Central University

zh: 通過與大三學生一起開展 45 多次文獻綜述，帶領研究方向優化，使研究團隊採納了 2 種新方法。
開發了一個基於 transformer 的貨幣匯率預測系統，在7天預測週期內比隨機游走基準減少了 10% 的 SMAPE 誤差。
在 2025 年 MTPC 會議上發表了關於通貨膨脹預測的研究論文，引入了用於貨幣政策分析的創新機器學習增強因子模型。
en: Spearheaded research direction optimization by conducting 45+ literature reviews with junior students, resulting in 2 new methodologies being adopted by the research team.
Developed a transformer-based currency exchange rate prediction system achieving 10% lower SMAPE than random walk baseline over 7-day forecasting horizon.
Published research paper on inflation forecasting at 2025 MTPC conference, introducing novel ML-augmented factor model for monetary policy analysis.

title.zh: 自然語言處裡/圖像辨識 助教

zh: 進行基礎課程教學、安排考試內容與考題檢討。
en: Conducted basic course teaching, arranged exam content and review questions.

title.zh: 和泰 MaaS 黑客松 1st 名

zh: 帶領跨領域團隊開發 AI 驅動的旅行平台，在台灣全國創新競賽中 235 隊中獲得第 1 名。

設計並實做了一個基於大型語言模型(LLM)的旅行推薦系統：

  • 整合電腦視覺演算法，分析旅行圖像並提取關鍵旅遊地點。
  • 開發個性化引擎，處理歷史行為數據以生成量身定制的行程。
  • 與微軟雲架構師合作，優化系統並在 Azure 平台上部署。
en: Led a cross-functional team to develop an AI-powered travel platform, winning 1st place among 235 teams in Taiwan’s National Innovation Competition.

Architected and implemented an LLM-based travel recommendation system by:

  • Designed and integrated computer vision algorithms to analyze travel imagery and extract key features.
  • Engineered a personalization engine processing historical behaviors to generate tailored itineraries
  • Collaborated with Microsoft Cloud Architects to optimize system and deployment on Azure platform

zh: 策劃了一個為期 8 週的演算法訓練營，有超過 65 名跨領域學員。
帶領 8 個大學團隊在全國創新競賽中獲得領先位置，通過結構化的指導計劃達成 88% 的獲獎率。
為 100 多名農村學生開發並實施編程課程，通過建立可持續的學習途徑提高編程素養。
負責中央大學在教育部下的開源教育專案，同時擔任志工協助 SITCON 會議發展，使其覆蓋台灣各地的 10,000 多名學生參與者。
en: Orchestrated a 8-week algorithm bootcamp with 65+ cross-department participants.
Led 8 university teams to secure top positions in national innovation competitions, achieving a 88% award-winning rate through structured mentoring programs.
Developed and implemented coding curriculum for 100+ rural students, increasing programming literacy by establishing sustainable learning pathways
Led development of national open-source education projects under Ministry of Education, while driving SITCON conference growth to reach 10,000+ student participants across Taiwan.

title.zh: 第三名 - 資訊應用服務創新競賽資安技術組
title.en: 3rd Place - Information Application Service Innovation Competition

zh: 通過運用 LoRA 微調 Code Llama，設計了一種最先進的 LLM 反編譯器，在將二進制轉換為可讀內核代碼方面達到了 89% 的準確率 。
領導開發自定義標記化處理流程，通過並行計算優化將處理時間減少了 65% 。
指導 3 名初級開發人員學習 MLOps 工作流，使部署週期加快 40%，並在 1,600 多個團隊的競賽中成功取得了的名次。
en: Architected a state-of-the-art LLM decompiler by leveraging Code Llama, achieving 89% accuracy in converting binary to readable kernel code.
Mentored 3 junior developers in MLOps practices, resulting in 40% faster deployment cycles and successful competition placement among 1,600+ teams.
Led development of custom tokenization pipeline reducing processing time by 65% through parallel computing optimization.

title.zh: 大專學生研究計畫 - 國家科學及技術委員會
title.en: College Student Research Scholarship - National Science and Technology Council

zh: 通過提出關於「基於轉換器的時間序列分析」的開創性提案，在超過9,000名申請者中脫穎而出，成功獲得48,000美元的國家研究資助。
en: Secured $48,000 national research grant by outcompeting 9,000+ applicants with pioneering proposal on "Transformer-Based Time Series Analysis".

title.zh: 合規/公司治理特別獎 - Lawsnote 黑客松
title.en: Special Award for Compliance/Corporate Governance - Hackathon Lawsnote

zh: 開發知識產權權利法律遵循平台，通過實施基於自然語言處理的法律文件分析，將跨區域合規處理時間減少了 85% 。
在20個專業團隊中獲得特別獎，提供了整合 RESTful API 和自動化合規驗證的端到端解決方案。
en: Led development of IP rights alignment platform reducing cross-regional compliance processing time by 85% by implementing NLP-based legal document analysis
Secured Special Award among 20 professional teams by delivering end-to-end solution integrating REST APIs and automated compliance validation

title.zh: 第一名 - 中央大學資訊工程系專題競賽AI組
title.en: 1st Place - NCU Special Project Competition in CS AI Group

zh: 透過搭建先進的 transformer 時間序列模型，實現七日內優於隨機漫步的匯率預測系統。
en: Build an advanced transformer-based time series model to achieve a currency exchange rate prediction system that outperforms random walk models within a seven-day period.

title.zh: 跨域整合特別獎 - 2022全國大專校院智慧創新暨跨域整合創作競賽
title.en: Special Award for Cross-Domain Integration - National Innovation and Integration Creation Competition

zh: 一個整合多家外送平台的比價系統，讓使用者能一站式比較價格、評價並直接下單。
en: A price comparison system that integrates multiple delivery platforms, allowing users to compare prices, review and place orders directly in one place.
